class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        lis = [[-1,-1], [n+1,n+1]]
        sm = n - 1
        ans = []
        for i,j in queries:
            inx = bisect.bisect(lis, [i-1,n+1])
            a, b = lis[inx-1]
            if b <= i and (lis[inx][0] > i or lis[inx][1] < j):
                tep = j - i - 1
                end = inx
                while lis[end][0] < j:
                    tep -= lis[end][1] - lis[end][0] - 1
                    end += 1
                sm -= tep
                lis[inx:end] = [[i,j]]
            ans.append(sm)
        return ans
